alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:38PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sweet Grass and central Park Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 534 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers and thunderstorms over Gallatin county producing strong wind gusts. This activity will move into Park county through 630 PM MDT. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Wind gusts will likely arrive ahead of any rain or thunder. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Clyde Park, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Springdale, Chico and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley
